comment.author: 23393335@N06
comment._content: Now, this is a 'square dance'! The four couple you can see [including the hand] are in a circle, doing a 'grand right and left', where the men go in one direction around the 'square' of four couples and the women the other, given each other alternatively their right and left hand as they pass in the opposite direction [see the arm and hand directly at the back of the photo]. This is probably as the dancers have been around the circle and met their partners, where they would 'swing'.

comment._content: this is awesome. they all look rather drear and unhappy though

comment.author: 46745998@N07
comment._content: People were very poor. Food was in short supply. You don't get fat on poke salad, corn pone and pinto beans.

comment.author: 50432768@N06
comment._content: looks kinda like the two ladies are about to go at it , the man maybe trying to hold her back? People did get very fat on pinto beans , polk , and other delicacies , if they just sat around and drank the ole lightnin.
